metaDescription: Discover a messaging platform for non-profits, offering community forums, resource sharing, and customizable workflows to empower change-makers.

features.title: Community Forum
features.description: Engage with supporters, donors, and beneficiaries by providing a platform for discussions, updates, and feedback.

features.title: Resource Sharing
features.description: Exchange essential resources, templates, and best practices within your non-profit community.

features.title: Customizable Workflows
features.description: Adapt the platform to suit the unique needs and processes of your non-profit organization.

tabs.title: External Collaboration
tabs.description: Invite external partners, donors, or stakeholders to specific channels, fostering cooperation and transparency.

tabs.title: Threaded Conversations
tabs.description: Keep discussions organized and focused by replying directly to specific messages within channels.

tabs.title: Mobile Compatible
tabs.description: Stay connected with your community on the go, ensuring you never miss an important update or conversation.
